item.title: 西门子能源考虑在 Gamesa 风电部门裁员 4100 人
item.description: 西门子能源股份公司（Siemens Energy AG）正在考虑裁减其陷入困境的 Gamesa 风力涡轮机部门的 4100 个工作岗位，据熟悉相关讨论的人士透露，该公司正在与劳工代表就结构调整问题进行谈判。【原文：Siemens Energy AG is weighing cutting 4,100 jobs at its troubled Gamesa wind turbine unit as the company enters talks with labor representatives on structural changes, according to people familiar with the discussions.】

item.title: 随着时间的流逝，必和必拓与盎格鲁集团在南非问题上仍存在分歧
item.description: 在剩下不到一天的时间里，必和必拓集团和英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）的顾问们仍在努力寻找突破口，以挽救必和必拓雄心勃勃的 490 亿美元收购计划。【原文：With less than one day left on the clock, advisers for BHP Group and Anglo American Plc were still struggling to find a breakthrough to salvage BHP’s ambitious $49 billion takeover plan.】

item.title: 伊拉克库尔德地区的石油公司发出愿意谈判的信号
item.description: 在伊拉克库尔德地区运营的国际石油公司表示，他们愿意与联邦政府和地区当局就合同条款进行谈判，以期重启停滞了一年多的出口。【原文：International oil companies operating in Iraq’s Kurdish region say they are willing to negotiate contract terms with both federal government and regional authorities in a bid to restart exports that have been stalled for more than a year.】

item.title: 芝加哥犯罪事件促使中粮集团计划迁往郊区
item.description: 据知情人士透露，中国最大食品公司的贸易部门中粮国际有限公司（Cofco International Ltd.）将把芝加哥市中心的办事处迁往郊区，部分原因是犯罪活动持续不断。【原文：Cofco International Ltd., the trading arm of China’s largest food company, will relocate its downtown Chicago office to the suburbs in part due to persistent crime, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 德国希望欧盟推动终止最后 20% 的俄罗斯能源进口
item.description: 在本周于布鲁塞尔召开的部长会议之前，德国呼吁欧盟采取更多措施，遏制仍在向欧盟海岸进口的最后 20% 的俄罗斯能源。【原文：Germany is calling for the European Union to do more to curtail the last 20% of Russian energy imports still coming to the bloc’s shores ahead of a meeting of ministers in Brussels this week.】

item.title: 前先锋公司首席执行官称美国联邦贸易委员会在埃克森交易中错误地诋毁了他
item.description: 前先锋自然资源公司（Pioneer Natural Resources Co.首席执行官斯科特-谢菲尔德（Scott Sheffield）说，联邦监管机构错误地描述了事实，并错误地诋毁他，说他试图与欧佩克（OPEC）勾结以抬高原油价格。【原文：Former Pioneer Natural Resources Co. Chief Executive Officer Scott Sheffield says federal regulators mischaracterized facts and wrongly vilified him in saying he tried to collude with OPEC to prop up crude prices.】

item.title: 丰业银行称加拿大降息需数月才能帮助消费者
item.description: 新斯科舍银行（Bank of Nova Scotia）的一位高管表示，虽然降低借贷成本的预期正在形成，但对于银行客户来说，降息 "真正见效 "还需要长达三个季度的时间。【原文：While expectations for lower borrowing costs are building, it will take as long as three quarters for interest-rate cuts “to really bear fruit” for bank customers, according to a Bank of Nova Scotia executive.】

item.title: 在线体育博彩玩家究竟是如何赚钱的？
item.description:
以及在线体育博彩公司如何从玩家手中获利。【原文：

And how the online sportsbooks win from the players.

】

item.title: 股东反弹后，Boohoo 取消高管奖金计划
item.description: 在线时尚零售商 Boohoo Group Plc 取消了一项丰厚的高管奖金计划，原因是有报道称在亏损膨胀后，该计划遭到了股东的反弹。【原文：Online fashion retailer Boohoo Group Plc scrapped a lucrative bonus plan for executives amid reports of a shareholder backlash following ballooning losses.】

item.title: 欧盟即将就倒闭贷款人达成协议，迈向更紧密的银行业关系之路
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，欧盟即将就一些措施达成协议，这些措施将使陷入困境的小型贷款机构更容易清盘。【原文：The European Union is nearing a deal on measures that would make it easier to wind down smaller lenders that run into trouble, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 阿根廷最富裕地区的债券持有人质疑米莱的决心
item.description: 布宜诺斯艾利斯省的债券持有人猜测，即使是挥舞着电锯的阿根廷总统哈维尔-米莱伊（Javier Milei）也不会无情到让这个阿根廷最富裕的地区破产。【原文：Bondholders in the Province of Buenos Aires are speculating that even Argentina’s chainsaw wielding President Javier Milei isn’t ruthless enough to let the nation’s richest region go bankrupt.】

item.title: 大选疑云重重，华尔街在 "重重迷雾 "中蹒跚前行
item.description:
当焦点转向 2025 年时，甚至没有人能够就今年的结果达成一致

。【原文：

As focus turns to 2025, no one can even agree on how this year will turn out

】

item.title: 日元兑英镑汇率跌至近 16 年来最低点
item.description: 日元兑英镑汇率跌至近16年来的最弱水平，再次引发了人们对货币贬值的担忧，这种担忧今年一直困扰着政策制定者。【原文：The yen slumped to its weakest level in almost 16 years against the British pound, renewing concern over a currency depreciation that has dogged policymakers this year.】

item.title: 加拿大帝国商业银行（CIBC）从巴克莱银行（Barclays）收购阿斯顿，推进美国杠杆融资业务
item.description: 加拿大帝国商业银行（Canadian Imperial Bank of Commerce）从巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）聘请了资深银行家布拉德-阿斯顿（Brad Aston）负责资本市场业务，从而扩大了其在杠杆融资领域的覆盖范围。【原文：Canadian Imperial Bank of Commerce is bulking up its coverage in leveraged finance, hiring veteran banker Brad Aston from Barclays Plc for its capital-markets business.】

item.title: 银行开始出售 Roark's Subway 三明治连锁店的债券 LBO
item.description: 据知情人士透露，银行周二启动了 33.5 亿美元的债券销售，以帮助支付罗克资本集团（Roark Capital Group）收购餐饮连锁店 Subway 的费用。【原文：Banks kicked off a $3.35 billion bond sale Tuesday to help pay for Roark Capital Group’s buyout of restaurant chain Subway, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: Neddsbank 结束与南非 Transnet 就古普塔相关交易的谈判
item.description: 奈德银行集团有限公司（Nedbank Group Ltd.）与南非港口和货运铁路运营商 Transnet SOC 有限公司（Transnet SOC Ltd.）结束了调解程序，以解决有争议的利率掉期交易纠纷。【原文：Nedbank Group Ltd. has ended a mediation process with South Africa’s port and freight rail operator Transnet SOC Ltd., to resolve a dispute over contested interest-rate swap transactions.】

item.title: 纽约证券交易所和 Cboe 暂停路由至交易所后，MEMX 问题得到解决
item.description: 包括纽约证券交易所、纳斯达克和 Cboe 在内的多家交易所都提到了 MEMX LLC 出现的问题，它们暂时中止了一些美股大公司创办的 MEMX LLC 的路由。【原文：An issue at MEMX LLC was cited by exchanges including NYSE, Nasdaq and Cboe which temporarily suspended routing to the venue founded by some of the biggest players in US stocks.】

item.title: 埃利奥特斥资 25 亿美元瞄准德州仪器的现金流
item.description: 激进投资者埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）已在德州仪器公司（Texas Instruments Inc.【原文：Activist investor Elliott Investment Management has invested more than $2.5 billion in Texas Instruments Inc. and is pushing the company to improve its free cash flow.】

item.title: 西班牙银行寻求出售 5.5 亿欧元贷款
item.description: Bankinter SA 正试图出售价值约 5.5 亿欧元（约合 5.98 亿美元）的贷款，与其他西班牙贷款机构一道出售资产，以腾出资产负债表。【原文：Bankinter SA is trying to sell loans worth about €550 million ($598 million), joining other Spanish lenders that are offloading assets in an effort to free up their balance sheets.】

item.title: 伊利诺伊州即将提高体育博彩税，DraftKings 下跌
item.description: 伊利诺伊州参议院通过提高体育博彩税的立法后，DraftKings 公司和 FanDuel 的所有者 Flutter Entertainment Plc 周二下跌。【原文：DraftKings Inc. and FanDuel-owner Flutter Entertainment Plc fell on Tuesday after the Illinois Senate passed legislation that would raise taxes on sports betting.】

item.title: 变压器起火，法国电力公司将核反应堆停运一个月
item.description: 昨晚，帕卢埃尔（Paluel）电站非核心部分的关键设备发生火灾，法国电力公司（Electricite de France SA）将一个反应堆停运约一个月。【原文：Electricite de France SA halted a reactor for about a month after a fire broke out last night on key equipment in the non-nuclear part of the Paluel power station.】

item.title: 希腊船只在红海被撞后进水
item.description: 据海事安全公司 Ambrey 称，一艘散货船在红海航行时遭到袭击，船只进水导致向一侧倾斜。【原文：A bulk carrier was attacked while sailing through the Red Sea and the vessel has taken on water causing it to lean to one side, according to maritime security firm Ambrey.】

item.title: 欧洲最大养老基金出售 100 亿欧元化石燃料资产
item.description: 欧洲最大的养老基金 Stichting Pensioenfonds ABP 退出了所有石油、天然气和煤炭领域的流动资产，价值约 100 亿欧元（108 亿美元），以实现绿色环保。【原文：Europe’s biggest pension fund, Stichting Pensioenfonds ABP, has exited all liquid assets in oil, gas and coal worth about €10 billion ($10.8 billion), in an effort to be greener.】

item.title: 波兰银行在遭遇 150 亿美元打击后着眼于增加诉讼交易的甜头
item.description: 波兰银行正计划提高向外币抵押贷款者提供的结算方式的吸引力，以缩短法律诉讼的时间，因为这一事件已经引发了价值 600 亿兹罗提（约合 154 亿美元）的法律纠纷。【原文：Polish banks are planning to boost the attractiveness of settlements offered to foreign-currency mortgage takers to shorten legal battles after the saga has fueled legal provisions worth 60 billion zloty ($15.4 billion).】

item.title: 巴西财政部负责人表示，巴西正在寻找出售绿色债券的窗口
item.description: 巴西财政部长罗热里奥-塞隆（Rogerio Ceron）表示，巴西已做好准备，一旦波动减弱，就会在债务市场上第二次出售可持续债券。【原文：Brazil is ready to tap debt markets with a second sale of sustainable bonds as soon as volatility subsides, said Treasury Secretary Rogerio Ceron.】

item.title: 德国取消对 N26 客户增长长达三年的限制
item.description: 在金融科技公司 N26 Bank AG 努力改进其金融犯罪和反洗钱控制措施后，德国金融监管部门将取消对该公司客户数量长达三年的限制。【原文：Germany’s financial watchdog is lifting a three-year-old cap on the number of customers N26 Bank AG can take on after the fintech worked to improve its financial crime and anti-money laundering controls.】

item.title: 亿万富翁领导的 QXO 聘用巴克莱银行家伊赫桑-埃赛义德（Ihsan Essaid）担任首任财务总监
item.description: 卡车运输业亿万富翁布拉德-雅各布斯（Brad Jacobs）的新公司 QXO Inc.【原文：QXO Inc., the new company of trucking billionaire Brad Jacobs, hired a Wall Street banker to run its finances as it gets closer to becoming a publicly-traded business.】

item.title: 投资者踊跃参与沙特首次公开募股，订单总额达 1,760 亿美元
item.description: 四家沙特阿拉伯公司的首次公开募股共吸引了 6,590 亿里亚尔（1,760 亿美元）的订单，因为基金经理们蜂拥而至，在过去两年里，这些公司的股票销售提供了近乎保证的回报。【原文：Four Saudi Arabian companies have drawn a combined 659 billion riyals ($176 billion) in orders for their initial public offerings, as fund managers flocked to share sales that have offered near-guaranteed returns over the last two years.】

item.title: 奈拉坚挺，央行在流动性担忧下抛售美元
item.description: 由于尼日利亚央行进入外汇市场抛售美元，奈拉汇率接近一个多月来的最强水平。【原文：The naira traded near its strongest level in over a month as Nigeria’s central bank stepped into the foreign exchange market to sell dollars.】

item.title: 欧佩克+会议召开前俄罗斯海运原油出口下降
item.description:
四周平均流量连续第三周下降

。【原文：

Four-week average flows were down for a third straight week
